description: '''Keshav Sathe''' (31 January 1928 – 18 January 2012) was an Indian [[tabla]] player, best known for his contributions to the [[Indo jazz|Indo-jazz fusion]] genre. Among his significant collaborations are the ones with [[Joe Harriott]] and [[John Mayer (composer)|John Mayer]] in 1965–70; [[Irene Schweizer|Irene Schweizer trio]], [[Barney Wilen]] and [[Manfred Schoof]] in 1967; and later work with [[John Martyn]], [[John Renbourn]], [[Danny Thompson]] and [[Julie Felix]].
